pages.text: 10|26|Xingshan zhe jiang shou shan bao, qie youyu qing, lian shang meiyou hei hui he you se, zhexie ren shi leyuan de jumin, jiang yong ju qizhong.

10|27|Zuo'e zhe mei zuo yi e, bi shou tongyang de e bao, erqie lian shang you you se——meiyou renhe ren neng bangzhu tamen duikang an la——tamen de lian shang fangfu you heiye de yanse. Zhexie ren shi huo yu de jumin, jiang yong ju qizhong.

10|28|Zai na ri, wo yao ba tamen quanbu jihe qilai, ranhou, dui yi wu pei zhu de ren shuo:“Nimen he nimen de pei zhu zhan zhu ba!”, Yushi, wo shi tamen bici fenli, tamen de pei zhuyao shuo:“Nimen meiyou chongbaiguo women,
10|29|an la zu wei women he nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, women dique hushi nimen de chongbai.”
10|30|Zai na shi, ge ren jiang kaoyan ziji zai shengqian de xingwei, tamen jiang bei song dao an la——tamen zhenshi de baohu zhe nali qu, er tamen suo niezao de yi huibi tamenle.

10|31|Ni shuo:“Shei cong tianshang he dishang gei nimen tigong jiyang? Shei zhuchi nimen de tingjue he shijue? Shei shi huo wu cong si wu zhong shengchu? Shei shi si wu cong huo wu zhong shengchu? Shei guanli shiwu?” Tamen yao shuo:“An la.” Ni shuo:“Nandao nimen bu jingwei ma?
10|32|Na shi an la, nimen de zhenshi de zhuzai. Zai zhenli zhi wai, chule mi wu hai you she me ne? Nimen zenme diandao shifei ne?”
10|33|Ni de zhu de panjue dui fangsi de renmen luoshile. Tamen bijing shi buxindao de.
